definition.name: get-vcpkg
definition.description: Run vcpkg to build C/C++ dependencies and cache them automatically.
definition.author: Luca Cappa https://github.com/lukka

inputs.name: vpkg_root_path
inputs.description: Specify a directory where vcpkg is already installed.

inputs.name: vcpkgjson_path
inputs.description: Specify the full path to vcpkg.json.

inputs.name: appended_cache_key
inputs.description: This value is added to the precomputed key used to restore/save the cached artifacts produced by vcpkg.

inputs.name: build_command
inputs.description: The full command to build, e.g. cmake -S ./src -B ./build && cmake --build ./build

outputs.name: cache_key
outputs.description: The key of the newly created cache entry.

steps.name: Dump variables
steps.run:
echo "VCPKG_ROOT=$VCPKG_ROOT"
echo "VCPKG_DEFAULT_BINARY_CACHE=$VCPKG_DEFAULT_BINARY_CACHE"
mkdir -p $VCPKG_DEFAULT_BINARY_CACHE
echo "VCPKG_COMMITID=$VCPKG_COMMITID"
echo "VCPKG_CACHE_KEY=$VCPKG_CACHE_KEY"
echo "::set-output name=cache_key::$CACHE_KEY"
echo "::set-output name=vcpkg_root::$VCPKG_ROOT"

steps.name: Restore vcpkg and its artifacts.
steps.run:
echo "::group::Restoring cache ..."
npm install
which node
node --version
node ${{ github.workspace }}/restore.js
echo "::endgroup::"

steps.name: Build.
steps.run:
echo "::group::Building ..."
echo "Executing the build command: '${{ inputs.build_command }}'"
eval "${{ inputs.build_command}}"
echo "::endgroup::"

steps.name: Save vcpkg and its artifacts.
steps.run:
echo "::group::Saving cache ..."
npm install
which node
node --version
node ${{ github.workspace }}/save.js
echo "::endgroup::"
